This application shows data from Teploty.info. If you do not have WiFi Thermometer yet, please visit www.Teploty.info first.
Up-to-date measured values are shown on the Home screen. All you need is to add so called App Widget named WiFi Thermometer, and set up login information.
Values are updated automatically every 3 minutes. Now continue by adding the widget to your Home screen manually.
Hints: tapping at the names of sensors opens up control screen for the given thermometer. Tapping at the value of a sensor opens up graph for the particular sensor.
